titleStmt.title: A speech to the people, or, A briefe and reall discovery of the unhappy estate of these most distracted times with a necessary caution to all good subjects / vvritten by T. I. gent. ...
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Jordan. Cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
